name: get_objclass
description: Returns the class (name) of the object.

name: get_objname
description: Returns the name of the object.

name: get_objtype
description: Returns the type of the object.

name: get_selectedboject
description: Returns the numeric id of the selected object. If multiple objects are selected, only one is returned - usually the one with the lowest id.

name: set_selectedobject
description: Selects the object designated by the given id.
